titles.title: Rock Creek National Park in the District of Columbia Act
To redesignate Rock Creek Park in the District of Columbia as Rock Creek National Park in the District of Columbia.
Rock Creek National Park in the District of Columbia Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

bill.summary: Rock Creek National Park in the District of Columbia Act - Redesignates the Rock Creek Park in the District of Columbia as Rock Creek National Park in the District of Columbia.
